xyz.cathal.answerbox

Class CommentAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter
        • xyz.cathal.answerbox.CommentAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter

    class CommentAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter
    This Adapter acts as a bridge between the comment data (an ArrayList of Comments) and the View which holds the data.
    Author:
    Christopher Durning

    • Nested Class Summary

      private class  CommentAdapter.DeleteCommentTask
      Represents an asynchronous request to delete a comment.
